text:
There has been a myth in the film industry that two actresses can't be friends or supportive of each other. Cat-fights are more than common and several tabloid headlines have claimed the same!
Twitter
But shattering this over-hyped myth, there are actresses who are supporting each other and social media a big enough proof. Be it cross-promoting each other's films or being with each other at the time of crisis, the dynamics have developed to an extent that things are more cordial and warm.
Twitter
Another instance that proves just this is Anushka Sharma and Deepika Padukone's online. DP commented on Anushka's look for an awards' night and that wasn't it. Both indulged into a conversation, proving that two actresses can definitely be good friends.

The recent developments on DP and Sharma prove that even though their friendship has indeed gone through a rough patch, currently things are all bright and happy between the two!
title: Deepika Padukone-Anushka Sharma's Bonding Shatters The Myth That Two Actresses Can't Be Friends!
